rotate_window.description: Rotate the window to adjust airflow.

clean_window.description: Wipe the window to remove dust and other particles.

window_frame_stability_check.description: Check the stability of the window frame.

clean_frame.description: Wipe the window frame to remove dust and other particles.

clean_window.description: Clean the window and window frame to remove dirt and debris.

complete_rotation_check.description: Check if the window can be fully rotated.

clean_whole_window.description: Clean the entire window including the window frame and the rotation window.
